annotation_sentence: Yes, I will work more hours this week. Maybe, um, I stay late? And I finish by Friday.
rationale: The word 'more' is a quantifier indicating an additional amount of hours.

annotation_sentence: Ah, yes, good idea. I will use calendar more often, with alert. This will help, um, a lot.
rationale: The word 'more' is a quantifier indicating an increased frequency of using the calendar. 'A lot' is a quantifier indicating a large amount of help.
